title: Z cars. Episode 01.
brief_description: A compilation of three episodes from the popular BBC television series of the sixties and seventies about a special crime patrol set to combat the growing crime rate. Cast includes Brian Blessed, Stratford Johns, Frank Windsor, Joseph Brady, James Ellis and Jeremy Kemp. Written by Troy Kennedy Martin and Allan Prior.
